mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HEALTH_DATA (TIME, USER_NAME, WALKING_DISTANCE, WALK_TIME, RUN_TIME, BREATH_EXTIME, SLEEP_TIME) VALUES (#{item.time}, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM LOGIN_RECORD WHERE ID = #{uuid}), #{item.walkingDistance}, #{item.walkTime}, #{item.runTime}, #{item.breathExTime}, #{item.sleepTime})
mapper.select: SELECT TIP_TEXT FROM HEALTH_TIP WHERE STATUS = (SELECT "SLEEP_" + SLEEP_STATUS FROM USER WHERE USER_NAME = (SELECT USER_NAME FROM LOGIN_RECORD WHERE ID = #{uuid})) OR STATUS = (SELECT "EXERCISE_" + EXERCISE_STATUS FROM USER WHERE USER_NAME = (SELECT USER_NAME FROM LOGIN_RECORD WHERE ID = #{uuid})) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4;
